unnormalised: Arre yaar, weather's always messing with our yields! Remember 20/07/2023, when the monsoon was late in Maharashtra? Poor farmers near Nagpur lost so much. Even with the best seeds from IARI, if it doesn't rain on time, say by 15/06, what to do? My uncle Shyam says old methods worked better. Plus, prices are always fluctuating in the mandi. Gotta hope for a good harvest by Diwali, say around 24/10. Jai Kisan!
normalised: Arre yaar, weather is always messing with our yields! Remember twentieth july two thousand and twenty three, when the monsoon was late in Maharashtra? Poor farmers near Nagpur lost so much. Even with the best seeds from I A R I, if it does not rain on time, say by fifteenth june, what to do? My uncle Shyam says old methods worked better. Plus, prices are always fluctuating in the mandi. Gotta hope for a good harvest by Diwali, say around twenty fourth october. Jai Kisan!
